definition: an instance of rapid strong pulsation, expand and contract rhythmically
details:
noun
- an instance of rapid strong pulsation
= example: an instance of rapid strong pulsation
= synonyms: pounding
- a deep pulsating type of pain
verb
- expand and contract rhythmically
= synonyms: pulse
- tremble convulsively, as from fear or excitement
= synonyms: shudder
- pulsate or pound with abnormal force
= example: pulsate or pound with abnormal force
